title: I’m Supposed to Be An Undercover Cop, Not The Sister-in-Law! - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Organized Crime   Police   Short Story   Strong Love Interests
author: Ke Le Ni Xing   可乐逆行
description:
A comedic and cute story about a little rookie police officer entering the underworld.

Ha, this underworld boss is quite handsome eh.

Ha, this underworld boss is a bit crazy.

What? What do you mean he fancies me so I have to climb into his bed.

He was here to be a spy, not the sister-in-law ok!>
